Text.Page:
My chief engineer left for Wyvern Watch this morning. I know he wanted to stop on his way and see some of those giants' constructs at the northeast end of the craters. That little guy sure loves machines.

Now I'm wondering if I should have let him go. I couldn't spare a guard, and Poihon's not as fierce as some poporis I've known.

If you go that way, will you look for him?

It was good of Adamael to worry about me. I did stop to watch Dredkreak. He's right over there to the southwest. Magnificent engineering!

I'd give a lot to be able to study him in one piece, but I'll settle for a handful of intact parts, if you can get them for me.
These will keep me busy for weeks! Thank you, <PCCLASS:lcase>!
I really need to get out of here before Dredkreak notices me. Can you get me those parts you promised?
